page.title: 02HOME LIFE SUTTON COLDFIELD
page.content: Thursday 8.30am.Mrs.Sutton waves goodbye to Mr.Sutton and daughter Sally as they drive away from their modern{semi-detatched}home.Mr.Sutton drops Sally off at{John Willmott {School}and goes on his way to the office in{Birmingham.}Meanwhile son Johnny has set off to work at the Reddicap Trading Estate where he is on a{Youth Training Scheme. } Mrs.Sutton puts out Tibbs the{cat } and{drives}to a nearby primary school where she{teaches.} 6pm.The family sit down to dinner which Mrs.Sutton has previously prepared. 7.30pm.While Sally stays in to watch T.V. and do her homework,her mum and dad go to play squash at{Wyndley {Leisure Centre,}and Johnny goes to play snooker at the local{Snooker {Hall. }
